turns.user: Need a multicity trip: Delhi to Dubai on 2026-06-10, Dubai to Paris on 2026-06-13, Paris to Delhi on 2026-06-20. 2 adults, economy.
turns.output:
Nice, that’s all set. I’ve found real multicity options for:

- Delhi → Dubai on 2026-06-10  
- Dubai → Paris on 2026-06-13  
- Paris → Delhi on 2026-06-20  
for 2 adults in economy.

You’ll now see the flights listed in your CheapOair results as **Recommended 1**, **Recommended 2**, and **Recommended 3** (if three are shown). To lock one in, just select your preferred “Recommended” option in the results and proceed to checkout on CheapOair.com.
